name: Pork Chops with Fennel and Juniper Berries
preparation: Season pork chops with Sea Salt and Pepper. Heat a frying pan over medium-high heat; add half the olive oil and cook pork chops until golden brown on both sides. Remove from pan and place on platter. Cover and keep warm.
Reduce temperature to medium and add remaining olive oil to frying pan. Saute fennel, onion and juniper berries for about 5 minutes.
Return pork chops to pan, cover and continue to cook until chops are fully cooked and fennel is tender crisp.
tips: If fennel is not available, use 1 1⁄2 cups thinly sliced celery.
